A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Imagine if someone had set out to deliberately derail the Star Wars franchise and you come close to understanding how poor TLJ really is. Ignoring all the history of the first trilogy\, the logic and physics of the universe and making a film that is boring\, jumbled that staggers from unfunny attempts at comedy to totally misjudged dialogue and sub-plots. Watch Force Awakens again instead and imagine the film that should have come next\, because this isn't it.
